changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'DATETIME2_CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATETIME2_CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATETIME2_CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION';
